snippet: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu went on TV on Sunday to make his case about Iran even more urgently to a broader American audience.
abstract: Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu takes to the airwaves in the United States to warn that Iran is only six or seven months from having what is needed to make an atomic bomb; Iran, which denies that it is pursuing nuclear weapons, warns it will retaliate across the region if it comes under attack.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu went on TV on Sunday to make his case about Iran even more urgently to a broader American audience.

headline.seo: Netanyahu Says Iran Is ‘20 Yards’ From Nuclear Bomb
headline.main: Israeli Leader Makes Case Against Iran on U.S. TV
headline.print_headline: Israeli Leader Makes Case Against Iran On U.S. Shows
